info.description: A Golang starter project with Vertical Slice Architecture
info.title: Golang Starter API

post.description: Refresh access token using refresh token

get.description: Get a paginated list of permissions
Get a permission by their ID
Get a paginated list of roles
Get a role by their ID

post.description: Assign a permission to a role

delete.description: Revoke a permission from a role

get.description: Get a paginated list of users
Get a user by their ID

delete.description: Soft delete a user by ID

post.description: Enable (restore) a disabled user by ID
Assign a role to a user

delete.description: Revoke a role from a user

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
